data.name: Colonial Chemical
data.description: Colonial Chemical products offer the mildest, naturally-derived chemistry found in the marketplace for Personal Care and household, industrial and institutional cleaner applications. Our products are key building-block ingredients used in a variety of HI&I and specialized products, as well as lotions and creams, hand soaps, body and facial cleaners, shampoos, conditioners and other personal care products.

data.name: Poly Suga® Mulse D9
data.description: Poly Suga®Mulse D9 is a PEG-free, nonionic fragrance solubilizer made from 100% biobased raw materials. It is hydrophilic, freely soluble or dispersible in water, and soluble in varying degrees in organic liquids. Poly Suga®Mulse D9 is used for oil-in-water (O/W) emulsification, dispersion or solubilization of fragrances and all types of oils. It is compatible with nonionic, cationic and anionic surfactants and is effective in systems with relatively high levels of electrolyte, acid, or base.

data.name: Cola® Dry N3
data.description: Cola®Dry N3 is a 100% active, non-mineral seal oil based drying agent for professional car washes. Cola®Dry N3 can be used in areas where hydrocarbon effluent restrictions are stringent and allow operators to stay within the capacity of current effluent treatment systems.

data.name: Suga® Nate 160NC
data.description: Suga®Nate 160NC is a naturally-derived, high-performance surfactant that provides numerous advantages for a variety of formulations. Using Suga®Nate 160NC, formulators can start with a high-foaming product and build to preferred esthetic properties, without concerns of irritation to eyes and skin. Suga®Nate 160NC is also very low in toxicity and cost-effective when compared to other surfactants used in typical sulfate-free formulations.

data.name: Cola® Det OKC-40
data.description:
Cola®Det OKC-40 is ideal for formulators seeking organic certification who plan to label their products as “Made with Organic…” and be in certified compliance with the National Organic Program (7CFR Part 205). Cola®Det OKC-40 is derived from 70% or greater raw ingredients and is processed to meet the Certified Organic requirements.

Cola®Det OKC-40 is a pure potassium cocoate soap that exhibits excellent flash foam, good color and low odor. Cola®Det OKC-40 is biodegradable, made from natural and renewable resources, and preservative-free – making it ideal for natural formulations, including high-lathering soaps and cost-effective cleansers.

data.name: Cola® Quat SME

summary.name: Chemical Name
items: Onium compounds, morpholinium, 4-ethyl-4-soya alkyl, Et sulfates

summary.name: Synonyms
items: 4-Ethyl-4-soya alkylmorpholinium Et sulfates, 4-Soya alkyl-4-ethylmorpholinium ethosulfates, 4-Soya-4-ethylmorpholinium ethosulfate

data.description: Cola®Quat SME is a cationic surfactant designed to neutralize a wide range of odors. The ingredient functions by complexing or neutralizing specific organic molecules and reducing their concentration in the vapor phase. Its low active level and full solubility in water makes it ideal for consumer deodorizer applications such as space deodorizers, carpet deodorizers, hard surface deodorizers, kitty litter and pet care. The ingredient may be used in a variety of personal care, household and industrial applications to reduce unpleasant odors.

data.name: Cola® Teric SC
data.description: Cola®Teric SC is a biodegradable amphoteric surfactant for cleaning applications at both high and low pH. This high-foaming hydrotrope provides superior cleaning performance over a majority of amphoteric surfactants. In addition to industrial and institutional cleaning, the mildness of Cola®Teric SC makes it a good fit for household and personal care applications.

data.name: Cola® Terge FACC

summary.name: Synonyms
items: 2-[(2-Hydroxyethyl)amino]ethanol, 2,2'-Dihydroxydiethylamine, 2,2'-Iminobisethanol, 2,2'-Iminodi-1-ethanol, 2,2'-Iminodiethanol, Bis-2-hydroxyethylamine, Bis(hydroxyethyl)amine, DEA, Di(2-Hydroxyethyl)Amine, Di(Beta-Hydroxyethyl)Amine, Diethanolamine, Diolamine, Iminodiethanol, N,N-Bis(2-Hydroxyethyl)Amine, N,N-Diethanolamine

data.description: Cola®Terge FACC is a fatty acid amido complex, which provides excellent wetting and detergency properties in medium and high electrolyte-based cleaning formulations. This detergent concentrate offers superior cost/effectiveness versus systems requiring the use of hydrotropes. Its foaming characteristics are low to moderate, producing a lower and less stable foam than ethoxylated nonionics. Cola®Terge FACC is ideal for use in heavy-duty floor cleaners and wax strippers. Product should be stored between 40°F and 120°F to maintain stability. Based upon chemical composition the product is expected to be completely biodegradable.

data.name: Cola® Wet MA-80
data.description:
Cola®Wet sulfosuccinates, chemically classified as dialkyl sulfosuccinates, are anionic surfactants that provide a wide variety of functional properties that include surface and interfacial tension reduction, wetting, dispersing, emulsifying, penetrating, and solubilizing.

Cola®Wets are suitable for use in a broad range of applications such as wetting agents, in cosmetics, detergents, agricultural, mining and textile products, as well as emulsifiers/dispersants in water treatment, paint, ink and polymerization formulations.

Cola®Wet MA-80 surfactant is an anionic surface tension depressant and an emulsifying, dispersing and solubilizing agent exhibiting high electrolyte tolerance. It promotes penetration and spreading of organic liquids as films.

data.name: Cola® Det DEF-40
data.description:
Cola® Det DEF-40 is an anionic/amido all purpose detergent concentrate that can be easily modified to produce a wide range
of low cost high performance products for industrial and household use. Cola® Det DEF-40 is a biodegradable surfactant
concentrate that offers maximum cleaning efficiency and excellent physical properties. It is 100% active content, clear and
with a low solidification point.

data.name: Foaming Mild Face Wash
data.description: This formulation features Suga®Nate 160NC, Poly Suga®Glycinate C, and Cola®Lipid C. When dispensed from a pump foamer, it generates a foam with a luxurious silky after feel. It is based on natural ingredients and exhibits very low irritation.

data.name: Antioxidant Face Wash
data.description: This formulation featuresSuga®Nate 160NC, Cola®Teric 2C and Cola®Mate LA-40. This conditioning face wash won’t dry out your skin and contains vitamin supplements for a beneficial antioxidant effect.

data.name: Bath Gel
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Det EQ-18, Cola®Lux SAO, and Cola®Lipid SAFL for a sulfate-free, color protection shampoo. Smooth and soften hair without worrying about stripping color.

data.name: Cold Cream Cleanser
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Lipid SAFL and Cola®Moist 200 in a mild, efficacious conditioner free of harsh quats. It leaves hair soft, shiny, and provides long lasting moisture to reduce frizz. It will not build up or weigh down hair.

data.name: Cold-Mix Conditioner
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Quat CCG for an easy mix conditioner with excellent wet comb properties. This quick, cold mix conditioner has all the conditioning benefits without the hassle. Mild and naturally derived, your hair will detangle and feel soft and silky.

data.name: Economy Natural Hand Soap (Easy Blend)
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Det KC-40 and Cola®Teric CDB to form a naturally, powerful soap that is soft and mild. Great for pumps and wall dispensers and it is easy to blend with fragrances and colors.

data.name: 95% RCI Foaming Face Wash
data.description: This formulation features Colonial SLES-2, Cola®Teric COAB, Poly Suga®Mate L and Cola®Liquid DL. This is a high-foaming, economical formulation that deep-cleanses and rinses clean for weightless body and shine.

data.name: Body Wash Crème
data.description: This formulation features Suga Nate 160NC, Cola TericLMB, Cola Mate DSLS, Cola Moist200 and Suga Quat L1010 to create a naturally derived shampoo that hydrates dry hair and locks in moisture without the use of harsh sulfates.

data.name: Bubble Bath Gel
data.description: This formulation features Cola Teric CBS-HP, Poly Suga Nate 160P NC, Cola Mate LA-40, and Cola Lipid C. This purifying shampoo deeply cleanses to free hair of product and pollutant buildup without over drying for more vibrant, healthy-looking hair.

data.name: Charcoal Cleansing Bar
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Teric CBS, Colonial SCS, and Cola®Moist 200 in a bar soap that deeply cleanses without drying out your skin. With activated charcoal, it will detoxify your skin, absorb impurities and oil and wash them away. Feel the deep clean in every pore!

data.name: Conditioning Hair Mask
data.description: This formulation features Cola Quat CCG for an easy mix conditioner with excellent wet comb properties. This quick, cold mix conditioner has all the conditioning benefits without the hassle. Mild and naturally derived, your hairy will detangle and feel soft and silky.

data.name: Daily Moisturizer (SPF 15)
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Fax CPE, Poly Suga®Mulse D6, and Cola®Moist 200 for a broad spectrum, mineral-based SPF 15*. This nonwhitening lotion is silky and dry to the touch. Light enough for daily use.

data.name: Economy Shower Gel (Sulfate-free, Alcohol Free)
data.description: This formulation features Colonial AOS-40 and Cola®Teric CDB for a sulfate free, alcohol free shower gel. With good, thick foaming properties, this shower gel is free from sulfates and alcohol.

data.name: Economy Hand Soap
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Det L116N a very mild, high foaming concentrate, to deliver a powerful, cost efficient hand soap that’s also easy to make.

data.name: Anti-Pollution Purifying Shampoo (Sulfate-free) #1032
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Teric CBS-HP, Suga®Nate 160NC, Cola®Mate LA-40, Poly Suga®Phos 8600P and Cola®Lipid BP. This purifying shampoo will free hair of residue and build up while antioxidants from Cola®Lipid BP helps protects your hair from pollution and other environmental insults!

data.name: Anti-Pollution Purifying Shampoo (Sulfate-free) #1036
data.description: This formulation features Suga®Nate 160NC and Poly Suga®Phos 1200P together as the base surfactants for this mild formulation with excellent foam, good viscosity, and gentle conditioning. The clear appearance of this formula demonstrates the ability to incorporate silicones and fragrances with no loss of performance or clarity.

data.name: Children's Shampoo
data.description: This rich formulation features Poly Suga Quat S1210P in combination with a cationic guar to provide excellent routine conditioning with minimum buildup. It will not weigh down the hair and is appropriate for most hair types.This formulation is developed with ingredients that meet Whole Foods Premium Body Care standards.

data.name: Economy Bubble Bath (Sulfate-free)
data.description: Immerse yourself in a bath full of cleansing soft bubbles without the harshness of sulfates. This bubble bath features Cola®Det DEF-60 for a high foaming luxurious bubble bath.

data.name: AHA Facial Wash
data.description: This high foaming shampoo formulation features Cola Teric LMB , Cola Mid CMPA , Suga Nate 160NC, Poly Suga Quat S1210P, and Cola Mate DSLS. This clarifying shampoo invigorates your hair by deep cleansing and freeing hair of residue build up. With naturally derived conditioning ingredients, your hair will be ‚Äúwet comb ready.‚Äù

data.name: AHA Facial Wash (Sulfate-free)
data.description: This formulation features Cola Teric CBS-HP, Suga Nate 160NC, Cola Mate LA-40, Poly Suga Phos 8600P and Cola Lipid BP. This purifying shampoo will free hair of residue and build up and with antioxidants from Cola Lipid BP, helps protects your hair from air pollution!

data.name: Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
data.description: This formulation features Suga Nate 160NC, Cola Teric CBS-HP, Cola Lipid C and Cola Mate LA-40. Lather in this rich, paraben and silicone free shampoo to gently cleanse, soften and protect. It is suitable for all hair types and ideal for chemically processed and color-treated hair. This formula is packed with natural and nourishing ingredients that are proven to work for manageability and shine.

data.name: Anti-Frizz Foamer
data.description: This mild, sulfate-free shampoo has very low skin or eye irritation potential and is suitable for all ages and hair types. Suga Nate 160NC, Cola Teric COAB and Poly Suga Glycinate C are used in this clear, lightly colored formulation that offers abundant foam and will not excessively strip or dry hair. Supplementary conditioning or a modified appearance may be obtained with the addition of other ingredients.¬†

data.name: Antibacterial Hand Soap
data.description: This formulation utilizes Cola Det EQ-18 in a sulfate-free shampoo featuring luxurious lather, easy rinsing, extra-gentle cleansers and appealing fragrance for a multi-sensorial, spa-like experience. Suga Det¬¨‚Ä†Pearl is used to easily generate a pearlescent formulation with minimal heating.

data.name: Antibacterial Hand Soap (DEA-free, Triclosan-free)
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Teric COAB, Cola®Liquid DC and Cola®Lipid C in a high-foaming, soothing hand soap that gently cleans with 100% natural moisturizers. DEA-free, Triclosan-free. Utilizes Cola®Lipid C to provide emolliency and boost antimicrobial performance. Ideal for repeated use in health care and other frequent handwashing settings.

data.name: Antibacterial Hand Soap (Higher Viscosity)
data.description: This formulation features Suga Nate 160 NC, Cola Teric COAB, Cola Lipid C, and Poly Suga Quat S1210P for a shampoo that soothes and moisturizes your irritated scalp for dandruff free hair. With added Eucalyptus ingredients for a calming sensation, it‚Äö√Ñ√¥s great for every day use!

data.name: Basic High Fragrance Conditioner
data.description: This formulation features Colonial 18-S, a vegetable derived ingredient used to condition hair and tame fly-aways. Can be used every day without leaving a greasy build up.

data.name: Basic Liquid Skin Cleanser
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Det DEF-26, Poly Suga®Quat S1210P and Cola®Det DEF-35, DEA-free ingredients, for a high efficiency 2-in-1 shampoo. These high foaming surfactant blends provide a good clean while conditioning ingredients smooth fly-away hairs.

data.name: Body Lotion with Argan Oil and Natural Moisturizers
data.description: This formulation features Cola Det EQ-17N, Cola Liquid DC, and Cola Lipid SAFL for a versatile cleaner for hair, body and face! This formula effectively cleanses hair but still gentle and mild enough for your hair and body.¬†

data.name: Body Wash with Natural Exfoliants
data.description: This formulation featuresCola®Det DEF-25 and Poly Suga®Mulse D9. This highly-fragranced formulation exhibits high foam in an economical method. Walnut shells naturally and gently exfoliate skin, leaving fresh, smooth skin with each wash.

data.name: Clarifying Shampoo
data.description: This formulation features Colonial SLES-2, Cola®Teric COAB, Poly Suga®Mate L and Cola®Liquid DL. This is a high-foaming, economical formulation that deep-cleanses and rinses clean for weightless body and shine.

data.name: Clearly Mild Body Wash
data.description: This formula is designed to provide mild, weightless conditioning and a healthy, brilliant shine without buildup. Features Poly¬¨‚Ä†Suga Quat S1210P¬¨‚Ä†and Cola Quat PDQ. Great as a starting formulation, ready to add extracts for luxurious botanical feature.

data.name: Color Protection Shampoo (Sulfate-free)
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Det EQ-18, Cola®Lux SAO, and Cola®Lipid SAFL for a sulfate-free, color protection shampoo. Smooth and soften hair without worrying about stripping color.

data.name: Dry Skin Rescue Body Wash
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Fax CPE, Poly Suga®Mulse D6, and Cola®Moist 200 for a broad spectrum, mineral-based SPF 15*. This nonwhitening lotion is silky and dry to the touch. Light enough for daily use.

data.name: Economy Body Wash (Sulfate-free, Betaine-free)
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Det DEF-61 for a sulfate-free and betaine-free body wash. With a high, creamy foam, this formula is great for sensitive skin for mild cleansing. All the ingredients in this formulation are Prop 65 compliant.

data.name: Economy Hand Soap (Sulfate-free)
data.description: This sulfate-free formulation packs a punch on dirt but not your wallet. The finished soap is soft, mild and offers superior economy. Clear, with enough viscosity for pumps and wall dispensers. Easy to blend with fragrance and color to choice.

data.name: Economy High Fragrance 2In1 Shampoo
data.description: This formulation features Cola®Det DEF-26, Poly Suga®Quat S1210P and Cola®Det DEF-35, DEA-free ingredients, for a high efficiency 2-in-1 shampoo. These high foaming surfactant blends provide a good clean while conditioning ingredients smooth flyaway hairs.

Its low active level and full solubility in water makes it ideal for consumer deodorizer applications such as space deodorizers, carpet deodorizers, hard surface deodorizers, kitty litter and pet care. data.description: Cola®Terge FACC is a fatty acid amido complex, which provides excellent wetting and detergency properties in medium and high electrolyte-based cleaning formulations. This detergent concentrate offers superior cost/effectiveness versus systems requiring the use of hydrotropes. Its foaming characteristics are low to moderate, producing a lower and less stable foam than ethoxylated nonionics. Cola®Terge FACC is ideal for use in heavy-duty floor cleaners and wax strippers. Product should be stored between 40°F and 120°F to maintain stability. Based upon chemical composition the product is expected to be completely biodegradable.

data.name: Cola® Wet MA-80
data.description:
Cola®Wet sulfosuccinates, chemically classified as dialkyl sulfosuccinates, are anionic surfactants that provide a wide variety of functional properties that include surface and interfacial tension reduction, wetting, dispersing, emulsifying, penetrating, and solubilizing.

Cola®Wets are suitable for use in a broad range of applications such as wetting agents, in cosmetics, detergents, agricultural, mining and textile products, as well as emulsifiers/dispersants in water treatment, paint, ink and polymerization formulations.

Cola®Wet MA-80 surfactant is an anionic surface tension depressant and an emulsifying, dispersing and solubilizing agent exhibiting high electrolyte tolerance. It promotes penetration and spreading of organic liquids as films.

data.name: Cola® Moist 200
data.description: Cola®Moist 200 is a highly ionized water soluble compound that enhances water bonding structures. It is highly hygroscopic at all humidities, attracting and binding water extremely effectively, and provides a higher humidity protective gradient on both skin and hair, to enhance miniaturization. This product is especially recommended for skin care, hair care, sun care, health care, and makeup products.

data.name: Cola® Lipid C
data.description: Cola® Lipid C is a coconut oil derived phospholipid composed predominantly of diester and triester phosphatides with multiplechain groups. Cola® Lipid C displays a broad range of functional attributes including gentle cleansing and foaming properties, antiirritation eff ects when combined with anionic surfactants, unusually high substantivity, long-lasting skin conditioning, and broad spectrum antimicrobial activity.

data.name: Cola® Det EQ-18
data.description: Cola® Det EQ-18 is a sulfate-free, gentle, concentrated blend of surfactants for use as a base for high-foam personal care products. The eco-friendly blend is free of alcohol, diethanolamides, lauryl sulfates, laureth sulfates, parabens and formaldehyde. The surfactant ingredients in this blend originate from natural, renewable resources. Cola®Det EQ-18 responds gently to viscosity-building with the simple addition of sodium chloride.

data.name: Cola® Teric CB
data.description: Cola®Teric is a coco-betaine made from a natural cocoamine source. It is functional in industrial and household formulations as well as personal care products. This product is soluble in both acid and alkaline pH. This biodegradable, high foamer is an excellent choice for formulating “green” products.

data.name: Cola® Teric CAB
data.description: Cola®Teric CAB is a high performance amphoteric surfactant that is stable over a wide pH range. It is compatible with anionic, nonionic and cationic surfactants. The properties of Cola®Teric CAB are not affected by hard water. Cola®Teric CAB exhibits high foaming even in high electrolyte solutions and is stable in 20% sodium hydroxide solution when solubilized with small amounts of hydrotropes. Cola®Teric CAB, made from a whole coconut source, is one of the mildest co-surfactants used for personal care applications and is glycerin-free and preservative-free.

data.name: Antioxidant Face Wash
data.description: This formulation featuresSuga®Nate 160NC, Cola®Teric 2C and Cola®Mate LA-40. This conditioning face wash won’t dry out your skin and contains vitamin supplements for a beneficial antioxidant effect.

data.name: Cola® Det L116N Technical Data Sheet
Cola® Lipid C Technical Data Sheet
Cola® Teric CB Technical Data Sheet-old
Cola® Lipid SAFL Technical Data Sheet
Cola® Det L116N Safety Data sheet
Cola® Mine RA-26 Technical Data Sheet
Colonial Chemical
data.description: Colonial Chemical products offer the mildest, naturally-derived chemistry found in the marketplace for Personal Care and household, industrial and institutional cleaner applications. Our products are key building-block ingredients used in a variety of HI&I and specialized products, as well as lotions and creams, hand soaps, body and facial cleaners, shampoos, conditioners and other personal care products.

TOP_BAR.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search by chemistry, function, application and more

HOME_PAGE.TITLE: Chemicals Marketplace - ingredients & raw materials - Knowde

EXPERTS.HEADING: Message Our Experts For a Fast Response

HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of suppliers and customers every day.

UNILEVER.QUOTE_CONTENT: Knowde is especially helping us with newer, smaller but up-and-coming suppliers that are useful to have on our radar especially in the field of Sustainability.

CURIO.QUOTE_CONTENT: Purchasing ingredients should always be this easy!

DIAMOND.QUOTE_BY: Diamond Overseas Trading Co. | Technical Manager
DIAMOND.QUOTE_CONTENT: It's an amazing website to search for chemicals and more!

PERSONAL_CARE.TITLE: Healthy Beauty by DSM
PERSONAL_CARE.DESCRIPTION: DSM has taken an in-depth look at the growing enthusiasm for medical beauty to make the best skin care ingredients for non-invasive solutions.

BEAUTY.TITLE: Beauty by Lubrizol Life Science
BEAUTY.DESCRIPTION: LLS partners with customers to develop, manufacture and market a broad range of differentiated ingredients for skin care, hair care and skin cleansing.

PEAS.TITLE: Plant Proteins by Roquette
PEAS.DESCRIPTION: The products made with NUTRALYS® don't just nourish us today – they help us feed ourselves tomorrow too. Together, we are changing how the planet eats.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

FEATURED_SUPPLIERS.LARGEST_SUPPLIERS: The largest suppliers at your fingertips.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
